title: Sketchy!
comment: It's a great app but very buggy colours are over written and colours are lost forever! Also there's no way to back up your colours!

title: Everything I want, and nothing more
comment: Import from the gallery! Zoom-in within an image! Copy hex code to clipboard! A light-weight app with a simple UI. Awesome work!

title: Thank you!
comment: Finally! Works great, nice clean interface and ability to copy colour code to clipboard. I've tried 10-15 colorpicker apps from play store but they are all terrible except this one.
